Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.controller

Class GameBoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.controller.GameBoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameBoardController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Handles all the fxml controller coordinates the action and takes care of displaying the update every time they are received

      Calls the update of the entire board in the game every time a new message is received from the server
      Parameters:
      board - a GameBoard containing the new state of the game send by the server
